comments:
A Subclipse user reported this problem to us.  See:

http://subclipse.tigris.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=533

Looking at the stack trace and our code, it seems like this problem has to be in Eclipse, not our code.  Here is the stack trace:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.locationFor
(FileSystemResourceManager.java:549)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.getLocation
(Resource.java:940)
	at 
org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.core.status.RecursiveStatusUpdateStrategy.statu
sesToUpdate(RecursiveStatusUpdateStrategy.java:61)
	at 
org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.core.status.StatusCacheManager.basicGetStatus
(StatusCacheManager.java:230)
	at 
org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.core.status.StatusCacheManager.getStatus
(StatusCacheManager.java:204)
	at 
org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.core.status.StatusCacheManager.getStatus
(StatusCacheManager.java:152)
	at 
org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.core.resources.LocalResource.getStatus
(LocalResource.java:168)

We've seen this before, but I'm still stumped about the cause.  

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 151447 ***
